channel.title: Tyler Perry on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Black Bear Names Lionsgate Vet David Spitz Head of U.S. Distribution
item.description: Spitz will assist Teddy Schwarzman’s production and financing company — home of numerous Oscar nominees — as it becomes a full-fledged indie studio.

item.title: Tyler Perry Confirms ‘Why Did I Get Married 3’ and Teases Original Cast’s Return
item.description: Tyler Perry is asking, “Why did I get married again?” To clarify, the movie mogul isn’t actually wed, but he’s finished the script for the long-awaited third movie in the &#822
